title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. To get opposite coefficients of y, multiply the second equation by -2. $$3x-4y=-11$$ (x-2*y=-5)*-2

title: Solve for x
text: y will be eliminated and then solve for x. $$x=-1$$

title: Substitute and Solve for y
text: Substitute $$x=-1$$ into one of the original equations and solve for y. $$3x-4y=-11$$ $$3\left(-1\right)-4y=-11$$ $$-3-4y=-11$$ $$y=2$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (-1,2).
